code: import{configureStore,combineReducers}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import authReducer from'./authSlice';import itemsReducer from'./itemSlice';import cartReducer from'./cartSlice';const rootReducer=combineReducers({user:authReducer,items:itemsReducer,cart:cartReducer});export const store=configureStore({reducer:rootReducer});
